name: Platformer Game (Gocra)
description:
This is a 2d platformer created for my A level, CS project.

The character must kill or avoid enemies and pitfalls. The player must traverse the map and reach the end of the level.

If you wish to make levels for the game you can use the level editor I created - https://gocra.itch.io/cs-level-editor

This may run on Linux, I have not tested it.

I will not fix any bugs.

I may or may not respond to comments, I am only using Itch.io for hosting projects.

NOTICES:

All fonts and audios and artwork in this repository are collected from the web, copyright belongs to the original author.

ART:

  • Tilemap - https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/textures
  • RPG Character Sprites - https://pipoya.itch.io/pipoya-free-rpg-character-sprites-32x32
  • Animated Heart Container In Pixel Art - https://temok.itch.io/heart-container-animated-in-pixel-art
  • UI Buttons - Pixel art - https://iopn.itch.io/ui-buttons-pixel-art
  • Social Media buttons - https://kayillustrations.itch.io/social-media-buttons
  • Button Asset Pack - https://adwitr.itch.io/button-asset-pack
  • Pixel Coins - https://totuslotus.itch.io/pixel-coins
  • The flagpole is from mario

MUSIC:

  • RPG Music Pack - https://svl.itch.io/rpg-music-pack-svl
  • Menu Sound Track - https://chiphead64.itch.io/menu-soundtrack

FONTS:

  • Minecraft Font - https://www.dafont.com/minecraft.font

made with python and pygame
